name: JFileSplit3.00g
short_description:
JFileSplit3.00g
=====================================
-->All new Lightweight Swing based GUI 
-->Platform Independent Tool
-->Split and Join Using same Tool
-->Portable!! no need to install
-->Small in Size(as small as 16KB!!!!)
-->Fast execution of splitting and joining
Requirements::
All you need is JAVA or JRE.
You can download the latest JRE from Oracle

http://java.com/en/download/windows_ie.jsp
summary: Split your files with GUI Platform Independent Tool
